thread.title: How Long Can a Hot Goalie’s Playoff Roll Last?

author: Michael Salfino
title: How Long Can a Hot Goalie’s Playoff Roll Last?
text:
Marc-Andre Fleury entered the Western Conference finals as hockey’s hottest goalie in recent history.
The Vegas Golden Knights star carried a .951 save percentage and four shutouts through the first two rounds of the Stanley Cup playoffs, tied for the sixth most in one playoff season, according to QuantHockey.com.
The Golden Knights’ opponent,...
